description:
THE WILD WILD WEST REVISITED (5/9/1979) (TV Movie)

It&#039;s 1885. Super agent James West and Artemus Gordon have been in retirement for years. But Villain extraordinare Miguelito Loveless Jr has somehow replaced the crowned heads of England, Spain and Russia with exact duplicates under his control. And President Cleveland could well be next. Pressed back into service and once again aboard their special private train, West and Gordon set out to stop Miguelito from taking over the entire world. It won&#039;t be easy, for it seems he&#039;s managed to develop the atomic bomb, about half a century ahead of its time. 

Stars:Robert Conrad as Jim West and Ross Martin as Artemus Gordon
Guest stars: Paul Williams (Dr. Miguelito Loveless,Jr.), Harry Morgan (Robert T. &#039;Skinny&#039; Malone), Jo Ann Harris (Carmelita Loveless), Trisha Noble (Penelope Devaraux, British Intelligence), Jeff MacKay (Hugo Kaufman), Susan Blu (Gabrielle Jackson), Robert Shields (Alan (Miguelito&#039;s $600 bionic man)), Lorene Yarnell (Sonia (Miguelito&#039;s $600 bionic woman)), Rene Auberjonois (Captain Sir David Edney)
Writer: William Bowers
Director: Burt Kennedy
